numbered_ace_sentences: 1. I notice a difference between the outlook of 15- to 24-year-olds and the outlook of people who are 40 years old or older.
2. The 15- to 24-year-olds have a more positive outlook than the people who are 40 years old or older.
3. The 15- to 24-year-olds say that the world is getting better with each generation.
4. I wonder why Indonesia is above 75% for both age groups.
5. I ask what Indonesia does in Indonesia.
6. I ask what makes people in Indonesia think in this way.
7. The title is "Sign of the Times".
